After channelling [[chakra]] into one's hand, the user grabs the target. The effects of the technique are unknown, but it seems to pose a serious threat as [[Minato Namikaze]] stopped [[Might Guy]] from performing the technique against the [[toads]] from [[Mount Myōboku]].

== Trivia ==
* The [[Genjutsu World]] version of Might Guy is able to use this technique.<ref>''Road to Ninja: Naruto the Movie''</ref>
